name: Anubis Statuette
description: After resolving this Zone, visit a real or unreal Zone you have not visited yet this turn. Move to the real Zone for that Time afterwards.

name: Artist
description: Draw a card.

name: Bag of Loot
description: Return this to your hand.

name: Barbarian Horde
description: Discard any number of cards. Advance one of your ♛ per card you discarded.

name: Black Market
description: When you play another card, gain an extra $2.

name: Conspiracy
description: Your scored cards advance an extra ♛.

name: Crown Jewels
description: Discards any number of cards. Gain $4 per card you discarded.

name: Engineer
description: Draw 2 cards. Discard 2 cards.

name: Explorer
description: When you draw a card, gain $1 (per card).

name: Friends in Old Places
description: Cards cost you $2 less to score.

name: Gang of Pickpockets
description: When you play another card, draw a card (after resolving the played card).

name: Gladiator's Gladius
description: Draw a card per Time you rule.

name: Golden Goose
description: Each other player gains $5.

name: Infected Rat
description: Each player with more cards in hand than you discards a card.

name: Inventor
description: Choose one: Draw 2 cards; or gain $8; or advance two of your ♛.

name: Investments
description: You may discard this from play at the end of a turn, to gain half as many $ as you gained that turn, rounded down.

name: Kill Your Grandfather
description: Discard your hand. Draw 2 cards.

name: King's Sword
description: Advance one of your ♛ per time you rule.

name: Mayan Ritual Knife
description: Each other player loses $2 per Time you rule.

name: Papal Tiara
description: Score a card (paying).

name: Predict the Future
description: At the end of this turn, you may change history in this Zone.

name: Prime Real Estate
description: When you advance a ♛ to Time IV, gain $1.

name: Secret Society
description: When you score a card, draw a card.

name: Settlers
description: Advance one of your ♛.

name: Shogun's Katana
description: Gain $2 per Time you rule.

name: Step on a Butterfly
description: At the end of this turn, change history in each real Zone, going from past to present.

name: Think Tank
description: When you discard a card, gain $1 (per card).

name: Treasure Map
description: After you visit a Time IV Zone, you may discard this from play to draw 2 cards.

name: Trinket
description: Play another card.

name: Tulip Stocks
description: Each other player loses $5.
